dct_title_s: Siege of Delhi. : Plan of the British position maintained from 8th June to 14th Sept. 1857.
dct_description_sm: Cartographic Details: Scale 1:6,000. 500 ft. - 1 in. (E 77째11'35"--E 77째14'12"/N 28째43'10"--N 28째39'18"). Relief shown as contours. Shows: roads, canals, position of British troops. Text and illustrated insets: Delhi Munity Monument -- Miniature embrasure built to mark the position of the batteries -- Siege battery memorials -- Cashmere Gate Memorial."Drawn in the Quarter Master General's Office, Simla, June 1876." Dimensions: 64 x 99 centimeters
dct_creator_sm: India. Army. Simla Army. Quartermaster-General's Office.
